Class Jackpot

public abstract class Jackpot
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the Jackpot

Author:
Andreas Pattakos

Constructor Summary
Jackpot()
           
 
Method Summary
static void add_Jackpot(Player P1, Player P2, int j)
          Observer: Adds the amount of Money(j) to the Jackpot
pre-condition: j > 0 post-condition: Removes the amount of Money(j) from the Money of the Player P1 and then puts it to the Jackpot
static void win_Jackpot(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Gives the player P1 the Jackpot
post-condition: Adds the Jackpot to the Money of the Player P1 and then makes Jackpot 0

win_Jackpot

public static void win_Jackpot(Player P1,
                               Player P2)
Observer: Gives the player P1 the Jackpot
post-condition: Adds the Jackpot to the Money of the Player P1 and then makes Jackpot 0

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn

add_Jackpot

public static void add_Jackpot(Player P1,
                               Player P2,
                               int j)
Observer: Adds the amount of Money(j) to the Jackpot
pre-condition: j > 0 post-condition: Removes the amount of Money(j) from the Money of the Player P1 and then puts it to the Jackpot

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn
j - the amount of Money that goes to the Jackpot
